mapper.sql: id, pid,user_name,password, name, pinyin,phone, address, bank
mapper.select:
select
from district
where user_name like '%${userName}%' and name like '%${name}%'
where user_name like '%${userName}%'
where name like '%${name}%'
limit #{begin},#{end}
mapper.insert:
insert into district
id,
pid,
user_name,
password,
name,
pinyin,
phone,
address,
bank,

mapper.update:
update district
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update district set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
